title: About
intro: All API Hub is a browser extension for managing both third-party New API-compatible relay sites and your own New API instance. It centralizes account and balance monitoring, smart sorting, and site detection, and provides automation features such as auto-refresh and temp-window firewall bypass. For self-hosted New API, it also offers channel management and model list synchronization, and integrates with CLIProxyAPI, WebDAV backup, and import/export tools.
githubDesc: View source code, submit issues or participate in project development
homepageDesc: View detailed documentation, user guides and more information
thanksDesc: Thanks to all developers who have contributed to the open source community, the development of this plugin benefits from these excellent open source projects and tools
privacyText: All data of this plugin is stored locally in the browser and will not be actively uploaded to any server. Your account information and usage data are completely under your control, ensuring privacy and security

review.title: Leave a positive review
review.description: If All API Hub helps you, a positive review on {{store}} really helps.
